description: Haramura Nodoka is a high school freshman who attends the same school as Saki and is a member of the Mahjong Club. She was the previous year`s National Middle School Individual Champion. Her skill, in comparison to Saki`s, comes from practicing via online mahjong. At the mahjong tournament, she is the vice-captain of the team. Her nickname is "Nodocchi" after her play style, quickly and efficiently racking up points as quickly as possible.
name: Haramura Nodoka
